description: Defines a work item (planned or recorded). This is a concrete class (you can have a work item) or you can include it specific derived classes.

allOf.$comment: TODO: Still to add other work item properties such as allocated people and equipment.

operation.description: Defines the operation from a list of known operation types.

priority.description: The priority of the item for scheduling or implementation.
